item.description:
*** This event is categorized as strenuous and is not for beginners ***

*** All hikers will be prescreened ***

*** Please add your name to the waiting list and you will be contacted by the organizer ***



We will meet at the Crawford Depot located to the left of the AMC Highland Center in Crawford Notch. From here we will ascend Mts. Tom, Field and Willey. We will return via this same route.


***** IMPORTANT NOTES *****

This event is categorized as strenuous and is not for beginners. You must have prior hiking experience in winter conditions to join this event.

All hikers will be prescreened

Please add your name to the waiting list and you will be contacted by the organizer

Please arrive early and be prepared to start up the mountain promptly at 8 a.m.

We will assess weather, time, trail conditions and the physical condition of the group during our climb. Changes can & will be made as necessary. Standing on the summit is optional, returning to the trailhead safely is mandatory. Mountain weather is subject to rapid changes and extreme conditions. Being prepared, traveling with the appropriate gear & knowing how to use it is your personal responsibility.

By joining this event you certify that you have read and agree to the terms of the NEHAG Disclaimer
item.name: Tom, Field & Willey
